<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get file download link asynchronously"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/presigned"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a link to download a file with the ID specified in the request asynchronously.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"File ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"File download link","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"filetype":{"type":"string","description":"File type","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"token":{"type":"string","description":"Token","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"url":{"type":"string","description":"Url","format":"uri","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"ASC.Files.Core.Helpers.DocumentService_FileLink"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
